remarks: A hyperplane is closed iff its orthocomplement is an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochshpsat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochshpsat.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochshpsat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochshpsat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dochshpsat.y $e |- Y = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
dochshpsat.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochshpsat.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. Y ) $.
dochshpsat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X <-> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. A ) ) $.
